<title level="1" pfs="">[Bandit](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3425)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bandits waylay travelers and plunder their valuables before disappearing back to their wilderness hideouts. Many bandits seek only to steal and release their victims alive, though a few prefer to leave no witnesses.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bandit.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Bandit](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3425)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 18

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +5, [Forest Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +4, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +6, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Bandit's Ambush** When the bandit rolls initiative using [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) or [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48), they can attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) one creature as a free action.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Machete](/Weapons.aspx?ID=95), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (10 bullets), [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet; forest passage

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
machete +9 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +9 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Dread Striker**   [Frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) creatures are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the bandit.

**Forest Passage**   The bandit ignores any [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) caused by plants, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth.

</column>
